CustomField.description: If it is not the most recent status change record, then the time elapsed between the status change is calculated in minutes and recorded in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If it is not the most recent status change record, then the time elapsed between the status change( that is time when the new record is created minus changed on date/time value) is calculated in minutes and recorded in this field.
CustomField.label: Time Spent In New Status
